page.title: 02THE VILLAGE OF BIRSTALL
page.content: Birstall is a large residential village in the Borough of Charnwood, to the west of the Soar immediately north of Leicester. Its extensive housing estates run over into the city.{The population is about 12,655 and the community is split by the A6 which links Leicester and Loughborough. Our traffic census at its junction with Greengate Lane showed{278 {vehicles leaving Leicester and 676 {heading towards Leicester}in a 30 minute period. 380 of these vehicles were Heavy Goods Vehicles. The Parish Council reported on improvements to the sequencing of the lights on 20.5.85. The only other crossing point is opposite Johnson Road. Pupils at Stonehill and Longslade frequently cross the dangerous dual carriageway section.
